synonyms.synonym: Cytochrome c oxidase subunit IV isoform 1

protein.specific_function: This protein is one of the nuclear-coded polypeptide chains of cytochrome c oxidase, the terminal oxidase in mitochondrial electron transport

reference.reference_text: Zeviani M, Nakagawa M, Herbert J, Lomax MI, Grossman LI, Sherbany AA, Miranda AF, DiMauro S, Schon EA: Isolation of a cDNA clone encoding subunit IV of human cytochrome c oxidase. Gene. 1987;55(2-3):205-17.
